profile.greeting: Welcome to The University of Technology, Jamaica {{user_first_name}}! Click get started to enjoy our sample automated messaging experience. If you want to build a similar one visit https://fb.me/get-sample-oc

get_started.welcome: Hi {{userFirstName}}! Welcome to The University of Technology, Jamaica, the home of world class athletes!
get_started.guidance: At any time, use the menu below to navigate through the options
get_started.help: What would you like information about today?

leadgen.promo: Hi {{userFirstName}}, finding great outfits is now easier and more convenient.
leadgen.title: 50% Coupon
leadgen.subtitle: Here is your coupon
leadgen.coupon: Added your coupon to this thread, you can now check out the discounted summer collection

curation.prompt: Please visit this link to pay your tuition online: https://ecommerce.utech.edu.jm/
curation.price: How much are you looking to spend?
curation.title: Summer collection 2019
curation.subtitle: Featured outfit

order.prompt: Please use the following link to view the module selection guide for your course of study: http://utech.edu.jm/admissions/enrolment/undergraduate-students/module
order.number: Sure, please write the order number
order.status: Your order is on it’s way, expect to have it in 3 days.

care.prompt: Please let me know what you want information on.
care.issue: Hi {{userFirstName}},please visit the following link for information on Admissions/ Enrollemnt: http://utech.edu.jm/admissions.
care.default: Hi {{userFirstName}}, please visit your portal at this link to get your fee payment information: https://evisionweb.utech.edu.jm/
care.style: Hi {{userFirstName}}, please visit the following link to make or view a medical appointment: http://utech.edu.jm/ohcs . Don't forget your health card and ID!
care.end: It was my pleasure serving you. Bye!

survey.neutral: Thanks for the feedback, if there something we should improve feel free to comment with #suggestion
survey.negative: Thanks for telling us. Sorry to hear that, if there something we can do to turn this let us know
survey.suggestion: Your suggestion has been recorded for future review by the team. If this is something we need to get back to you right now just comment "help"

chat_plugin.prompt: Thanks for visiting our store, be sure to check out all the great styles we have on the summer section.

fallback.attachment: Thanks for sending this attachment, we can connect you to an agent to review it or we can start over
